name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
